channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘This feels like an opportunity’: I’m 55, earn $78,000 and have no kids. My mother gave me $10,000. What should I do?
item.description: “I also have $1,000 on a credit card, which will be paid in full next month.”

item.title: ‘This seems absolutely insane’: Our children pay rent on our investment properties. Our lawyer says they should still buy us out.
item.description: “They have already paid the mortgage. It makes no sense to require them to ‘pay’ it again.”

item.title: My Taiwanese immigrant friend started working in Walmart for minimum wage and retired with $2 million. What was her secret?
item.description: “She owns two houses and lives with a disabled son.”

item.title: ‘The stress at my job is getting worse every day’: I’m 61, earn $177K, and have a 401(k) with $965K. Do I retire and downsize?
item.description: “I don’t want to end up in a nursing home on Medicare like my grandma.”

item.title: A squash game saved this famous trader’s life. How prevalent is male breast cancer?
item.description: The investor Steve Eisman said he has breast cancer and is undergoing treatment for the disease.

item.title: JPMorgan's top internet stock picks for next year
item.description: JPMorgan analyst Doug Anmuth believes that the AI theme will continue to "drive continued outperformance in Quality Growth, Momentum, & Mag 7 stocks."

item.title: Bank of America recommends these stocks because of their link to trends like the high-end consumer
item.description: Bank of America says stocks like Nvidia have more room to run.

item.title: U.S.-China soybean tussle reveals Beijing’s food security strategy. Goldman Sachs on how to invest
item.description: China's focus on food security mirrors efforts for self-sufficiency in chips and energy, Goldman Sachs said.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts are upbeat on these 3 dividend stocks for enhanced returns
